title: Getting Your Article Shared: Tips from Ten Years of Newsletter Curation
partialText: Some tips to make it easier to get your article shared in newsletters and social media, such as OG tags, a good sharing image, and some gotchas to watch out for.

title: Faking a Fieldset-Legend
partialText: Using CSS to make a heading overlay and clip the border of its own container.

title: Responsive Letter Spacing
partialText: Minimizing the readability impact of a typographic brand requirement.

title: Testing HTML Light DOM Web Components: Easier Than Expected!
partialText: Testing HTML Light DOM web components wasn't so scary after all. Some testing notes and patterns from a recent project.

title: Simple One-Time Passcode Inputs
partialText: Fully functional OTP entry may be easier than you think.

title: Talking CSS, Web Components, App Design and (gulp) AI on ShopTalk Show
partialText: I had a blast chatting with Chris and Dave on my personal favorite podcast about building websites.

title: That time some rando turned me into a meme coin
partialText: "I think someone made one of my tweets into a meme coin." She said, "I'm not sure I know what those words mean." I replied, "I'm not sure I do either."

title: How our dog increased my appreciation for accessibility
partialText: Our dog headbutted me, gave me a concussion and a new appreciation of accessibility features.

title: Android Instant Apps are Dead, iOS App Clips Should Follow
partialText: Google recently told developers that Android Instant Apps will be removed at the end of the year due to their low adoption. iOS App Clips, which provide similar functionality, should meet a similar fate.

title: Finding Joy on Shaky Foundations
partialText: The satisfaction of rescuing experiences from daunting constraints.
